full_sentence: I don't have a lot of experience with black people since there are not many in my town. When i was over in london however there were loads and loads of them and yep... they are scary... I have found them rude,they would push past your way,or be loud and aggressive and boisterous when around their mates..
It’s rather sad that these Muslims have nothing better to do than search for ways to be offended. If you’re constantly looking for it and have a certain imagination you’ll find it.
My neighbourhood is full of carpet pilots
junk people are always coming through here, it's almost unstoppable the wave of foreigners in dover
